00036 CVectorValue::CVectorValue(float x,float y,float z, AllocationTYPE alloctype)
00037 {
00038     SetCustomFlag1(false);//FancyOutput=false;
00039     
00040     if (alloctype == STACKVALUE)
00041     {
00042         CValue::DisableRefCount();
00043     };
00044     
00045     m_vec[KX_X] = m_transformedvec[KX_X] = x;
00046     m_vec[KX_Y] = m_transformedvec[KX_Y] = y;
00047     m_vec[KX_Z] = m_transformedvec[KX_Z] = z;
00048     
00049 }
00050 CVectorValue::CVectorValue(double vec[],const char *name,AllocationTYPE alloctype)
00051 {
00052     
00053     SetCustomFlag1(false);//FancyOutput=false;
00054     
00055     m_vec[KX_X] = m_transformedvec[KX_X] = vec[KX_X];
00056     m_vec[KX_Y] = m_transformedvec[KX_Y] = vec[KX_Y];
00057     m_vec[KX_Z] = m_transformedvec[KX_Z] = vec[KX_Z];
00058         
00059     if (alloctype == STACKVALUE)
00060     {
00061         CValue::DisableRefCount();
00062         
00063     }
00064     
00065     SetName(name);
00066 }

00074     m_vec[KX_Y] = m_transformedvec[KX_Y] = vec[KX_Y];
00075     m_vec[KX_Z] = m_transformedvec[KX_Z] = vec[KX_Z];
00076

00083     
00084 }

00095 CValue* CVectorValue::CalcFinal(VALUE_DATA_TYPE dtype, VALUE_OPERATOR op, CValue *val)
00096 {
00097     CValue *ret = NULL;
00098     
00099     switch(op)
00100     { 
00101     case VALUE_ADD_OPERATOR: 
00102         {
00103             switch (dtype)
00104             {
00105             case VALUE_EMPTY_TYPE:
00106             case VALUE_VECTOR_TYPE: 
00107                 {
00108                     ret = new CVectorValue(
00109                         val->GetVector3()[KX_X] + GetVector3()[KX_X],
00110                         val->GetVector3()[KX_Y] + GetVector3()[KX_Y],
00111                         val->GetVector3()[KX_Z] + GetVector3()[KX_Z],
00112                         CValue::HEAPVALUE);
00113                     ret->SetName(GetName());
00114                     break;
00115                 }
00116             
00117             default: 
00118                 ret = new CErrorValue(val->GetText() + op2str(op) + GetText());
00119             }
00120             break;
00121         }
00122     case VALUE_MUL_OPERATOR:
00123         {
00124             switch (dtype)
00125             {
00126                 
00127             case VALUE_EMPTY_TYPE:
00128             case VALUE_VECTOR_TYPE: 
00129                 {
00130                     //MT_Vector3 supports 'scaling' by another vector, instead of using general transform, Gino?
00131                     //ret = new CVectorValue(val->GetVector3().Scaled(GetVector3()),GetName());
00132                     break;
00133                 }
00134             case VALUE_FLOAT_TYPE: 
00135                 {
00136                     ret = new CVectorValue(
00137                         val->GetVector3()[KX_X] * GetVector3()[KX_X],
00138                         val->GetVector3()[KX_Y] * GetVector3()[KX_Y],
00139                         val->GetVector3()[KX_Z] * GetVector3()[KX_Z],
00140                         CValue::HEAPVALUE);
00141                     ret->SetName(GetName());
00142                     break;
00143                 }
00144             
00145             default: 
00146                 ret = new CErrorValue(val->GetText() + op2str(op) + GetText());
00147             }
00148             break;
00149 
00150         }
00151     
00152     default:
00153         ret = new CErrorValue(val->GetText() + op2str(op) + GetText());
00154     }
00155 
00156     
00157     return ret;
00158 }
00159 
00160 double CVectorValue::GetNumber()
00161 {
00162     return m_vec[KX_X];
00163 }

00166 double* CVectorValue::GetVector3(bool bGetTransformedVec)
00167 {
00168     if (bGetTransformedVec)
00169         return m_transformedvec;
00170     // else 
00171     return m_vec;
00172 }

00178 void CVectorValue::SetVector(double newvec[])
00179 {
00180     m_vec[KX_X] = m_transformedvec[KX_X] = newvec[KX_X];
00181     m_vec[KX_Y] = m_transformedvec[KX_Y] = newvec[KX_Y];
00182     m_vec[KX_Z] = m_transformedvec[KX_Z] = newvec[KX_Z];
00183     
00184     SetModified(true);
00185 }
00186 
00187 
00188 void CVectorValue::SetValue(CValue *newval)
00189 {
00190     
00191     double* newvec = ((CVectorValue*)newval)->GetVector3();
00192     m_vec[KX_X] = m_transformedvec[KX_X] = newvec[KX_X];
00193     m_vec[KX_Y] = m_transformedvec[KX_Y] = newvec[KX_Y];
00194     m_vec[KX_Z] = m_transformedvec[KX_Z] = newvec[KX_Z];
00195     
00196     SetModified(true);
00197 }

00199 static const STR_String gstrVectorStr=STR_String();
00200 const STR_String & CVectorValue::GetText()
00201 {
00202     assertd(false);
00203     return gstrVectorStr;
00204 }

00206 CValue* CVectorValue::GetReplica()
00207 {
00208     CVectorValue* replica = new CVectorValue(*this);
00209     replica->ProcessReplica();
00210     return replica;
00211 };
